name: Get Smart Multiple Choice Quiz | 10 Questions

questions.text: Maxwell Smart had this agent number:
The female agent who worked with him, and eventually married him.

questions.correct: hide in everyday objects and act as a message courier
questions.explanation:
hide in everyday objects and act as a message courier.

	Played by David Ketchum. Agent 44 also appeared hidden in objects, but not as often as 13.

android agent.

	Played by Richard Gautier. Hymie was created by an evil scientist (whose father's name was Hymie) and sent to capture a good scientist. But when ordered to kill Smart, he couldn't, and became a tool for CONTROL's use. Although strong and efficient, he was too literal minded.

questions.text: What did Max insist on using whenever he and the Chief discussed extra secret topics?
questions.explanation:
Cone Of Silence.

	The Cone Of Silence didn't work well. It usually muffled sound so well that nobody using it could hear anyone else in it.

questions.text: Where was Max's most commonly-used telephone located?
questions.explanation:
his shoe.

	Although all of the others have been used as phones, Max was best known for using his shoe phone.

questions.text: Which of the following was NOT a catch-phrase of Max's?
What 'Love Boat' actor had a recurring role as an evil agent?
What was the name of the agency that Max worked for?
And what was the evil organization that he most often battled?
